channel.title: Brazilian Jiu Jitsu on The Commonplace Book
channel.description: Recent content in Brazilian Jiu Jitsu on The Commonplace Book

item.title: Notes
item.description: Compiled Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Notes The Canon Gi John Danaher - Go Further Faster Vol 1 - Pin Escapes John Danaher - Go Further Faster Vol 2 - Guard Retention John Danaher - Go Further Faster Vol 3 - Half Guard John Danaher - Go Further Faster Vol 4 - Closed Guard No Gi Gordon Ryan - Systematically Attacking the Guard Gordon Ryan - Systemizing Closed Guard John Danaher - Enter the System - Armbars John Danaher - Enter the System - Back Attacks John Danaher - Enter the System - Front Headlocks John Danaher - Enter the System - Kimura John Danaher - Enter the System - Leg Locks John Danaher - Enter the System - Triangles Lachlan Giles - High Percentage Chokes - No Gi Lachlan Giles - Leg Lock Anthology - 50/50 Lachlan Giles - The Guard Passing Anthology - Half Guard Laclan Giles - The Half Guard Anthology Current Work 20191206 Estima Lock as a counter to the High Step when passing with Toreando 20191206 Shin to Shin to Deep Half Sweep 20191207 Pressure Passing the Collar Sleeve Guard 20191207 Dump Sweep -> Berimbolo 20191209 Add Lovato's Toreando sequence to the Stack Passing Sequences 20191218 Scarf Hold entries and attacking sequences 20191218 Follow up to the Breadcutter Choke (maybe the far side Arm Triangle?
